column4: if I save a file in the desktop it doesn't appear on it, I have to open the desktop directory via nautilus, and, as it reread he directory, the file shows up on Desktop too
that is a "feature" ;) it has to do with the fact that the stock hoary kernel lacks inotify support which is needed by gamin for reading the filesystem for changed files.
I noticed inotify was removed some days ago, it produced problems with hotplug, if I remember...
